description: Dive into the world of Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and discover how they are transforming digital ownership across various industries. Explore their origins, functionality, applications, and the potential implications on art, music, gaming, and real estate.
keywords: NFTs, digital ownership, blockchain, art, music, gaming, real estate, smart contracts, ERC-721, ERC-1155, digital assets, Ethereum, CryptoKitties, OpenSea, Rarible, digital marketplaces
title: Exploring the World of NFTs: Understanding Their Functionality and Influence on Digital Ownership
